Quality Education.reason: The course is an example of higher education, aiming to provide a 'comprehensive understanding' and develop students' ability to 'interpret Turkish history and culture'.
evidence: The aim of this two-semester course is to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of both the historical and cultural dimensions of the Turkic world.
By the end of the course, students are expected to develop the ability to interpret Turkish history and culture in an integrated and contextualized manner.
This course is intended for students of the Department of Turkish Language and Culture.
